E49.description: it appears that someold grudges never die . germany and russia have once again locked swords on the battlefield as russi strives to regains past gloriess and execute revenge on the germans.the german sphere in eastern europe prepares for the onslaught, and germany braces for the storm of once again fighting an two front war.can germany survive fighting both russia and the commune of france at the same time. only time will tell if germany can fend off two great powers or if history will repeat itself

E67.description: the syndicalist an radical socilist due to the previous gouvernement mismanagement of black monday andunion rallies leaving the socialist alliance to almost dominate politics
E67.title: 1938 greek elections

E53.description: the loss of the weltkrieg for greece was crushing the loos of macedonia crete war debts all those things included in one treaty this has caused harship on the people of greece this only worsened when the king fled in exile as the third republic of greece had been proclaimed only to result in years of coups until the regent stepped in in 1926 the king is still in exile awaiting his return meanwhile republicain syndicalist and monarchist back home hate the regent only time will tell if one of them gets in power
E53.title: the "kingdom" of greece

E68.description: following the surrender of the land fought for in the first weltkrieg whithout an figth to the belgrade pact whithout even an fight.Bulgaria is under fire right now with major protest.it is clear the tsar will not stay in power for long not even as an costitutional monarch. leaving the question of who shall lead bulgaria:the national populist zveno. the broad socialist or the radical democrats
E68.title: the question of leadershsip

E54.description:
following the end of the weltkrieg bulgario found itself in an golden age. being the hegemon of the balkans

but with the former prime ministers death in 1927 an new germanphobe would be able to get to power he and his allies saw germany as an threat so during the golden age they would start to drfit away from germany's sphere of influence.

with almost no allies in the balkans bulgaria finds itself encircled on almost all side by vultures readdy to end bulgaria's hegemony over the balkan
E54.answer1: cheers to one ore year of hegemony
E54.title: the tsardom of bulgaria

E55.description:
the regency seemingly had all the power that was until black monday more people by the day are loosing hope for the regency and eitheir siding with the formerly erased yugoslav mornarchist 
or social liberal\market liberal coalition soon about to be formed the future is looking bleak for the regent but only time will tell.

there is one more radical option being the black hand surely they wont get into power right
E55.title: rumors abroad

E72.description:
the triume kingdom of illyria consists of the former croatian dalmatian and herzegovinian kingdoms\condimoniums. it was  originaly proposed during the the 1926 crisis in the austro hungarian empire by croatian aristocrats and officers from the army who claimed to be loyal to karl while wanting autonomy and the end of hungarian rule on the south slavic land.
illyria is meant to be an homeland for the catholics croat orthodox serb and muslim bosniaks. but it isnt bosnia wants independence serbia wants to get its population back and the croat are trying to keep it together
E72.title: the kingdom of illyria

E57.description:
leading intellectuals in serbia  are eitheir radicls or democrats as such they are the biggest opposition to the regency their ideas can be seen all  across the country

this month  agroup of 70 intellectuals met in belgrade founding the nacionali kulturni klub (serbian culture club) eventhe leader of the democratic party was involved

their moto an strong serbian identy an strong serbian nation clearly laying their nationalist views while still being liberals hoping for the regency to end for the birth of an new republic
E57.title: formation of the skk

E20.title: the great revolt

E65.description:
after years of ressent and hatred towards bulgaria,the serbian led belgrade pact has taken upon themselves to destroy bulharian hegemony over the balkan pnce and for all. 
declaring war today the belgrade pact marches toward sofia with intent of seizeing both lost and claimed land from the bulgarian nation of course bulgaria will defend fiercly.

but whoever wins will not put the balkan at peace eitheir wya as proven many time before
E65.answer1: the final nail is being nailed
E65.title: the belgrade pact takes on bulgaria

E74.description: the slovenian resistance has inspired us to not only help them but eventually declare independence that is if-
E74.answer1: TOTAL LOYALTY TO KARL THE FIRST
E74.title: inspiration
E74.answer2: we will need to fight for our freedom

E58.description:
with serbia still reeling from the march on belgrade this caused instability in the regency
the liberal skk took advantage and had an lengthy meeting with the regent for the future of serbia

the skk proposal is radical reform turning serbia into an liberal republic its possible due to the putsh leaving the regents party damaged politicly with the chaos the iberals could come into power altough it migth the syndicalist more popularity
E58.title: a meeting with the regent

E26.title: bohemian independence

E27.description: the austrians rejected our offer this means war we need to reach vienna asap to end the war

E75.description: the austriab weight bearing down upon us has been pushed back but they will come back
E75.title: illyrian war of independence

E52.description:
he assasination of archduke ferdinand by an serb nationalist in 1914 started the weltkrieg 
despite an seemingly easy campaign the austrians were pushed back relentlessly until bulgaria joined the war. after the war bulgaria gained macedonia and other territories while the rest remained under austrian occupation until ethnic tensions forced them to retreat and apoint an regency

since then serbia has struggled to survive with her not being able to do any military actions or invasions against austria. so she is turning her gaze south to macedonia and other lost territories with greece and romania also having lost lands the dream of an fourth balkan war is not war off with an balkan pact against bulgaria

with the throne remaining empty who knows what'll happen will serbia beat bulgaria and stop there or form an slavic union or worse fail again only you can choos
E52.title: the kingdom of serbia

E59.description: with the monarchist gone people tought the political chaos was over since the monarchist were wiped but the national populist black n white hand both supported by prominement military leaders both uniting to take out the serbian gouverment what shall happen?
E59.title: the black hand attemps an coup

E35.description: the debate for which king should be elected has started the current contenders are an habsburg an true polish king and an lithuanian king who shall be elected nobody knows. there's also an saxon king but we're alredy so close to germany isnt this enough.
E35.answer1: can they hurry up there is an fucking economic crisis
E35.title: the great debate starts

E51.description:
the date has finnaly come the date when the birthright will bereclaimed and europe liberated by the thousand of french candadian heck indian troops land on the beachheads and push their way to paris eager to see their home once agan.the entente  is inches away from reclaiming their birth right reclaiming their nations
and their pride and the native people of france forced from their homes during the revolution can hear la marseillaise being sung an song they had not heard in years god save the entente
E51.title: THE ENTENTE MOVES TO RECLAIM FRANCE

E47.description: it has been over a decade since the end of the first weltkrieg. now there is an second fought between old enemies.france and its allies versus the german empire.both sides dread the return of trench warfare the scourge of the first weltkrieg.while germany faces off against france the russians eye their former land hungrily as itis possible to exploit the situation meanwhile the entente is gearing up to join the fight
E47.answer1: the kaiser is at war again
E47.title: the world is at war again
